title: Oregon Election Brings In Washington Heavy Hitters
teaser: One of Oregon's two Senate seats is up for grabs in November, in a race that has seen Party heavyweights campaigning.
contentencoded:
One of Oregon’s two Senate seats is up for grabs in November.

The two front runners, incumbent Democratic Senator Jeff Merkley and Republican hopeful Monica Wehby, have different views on business, trade and government. Each are attracting big donors and support from Washington politicians.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Kristian Foden-Vencil of Oregon Public Broadcasting caught up with both candidates and has this report.

  • Correction: Due to a reporting error, the original broadcast of this story incorrectly stated that the senate race was too close to call.  We regret the error.

Reporter

  • Kristian Foden-Vencil, reporter for Oregon Public Broadcasting. He tweets @KristianOPB.
